response.overview: A personal documentary about Lothar Lambert, his films and Dagmar Beiersdorf's friendship with him, which has repeatedly led to collaboration on film projects. For decades, the filmmaker (who, like Lambert, was born in 1944 and has also lived her entire life in Berlin) was Lambert's closest collaborator both in front of and behind the camera. Inevitably, this creates a self-portrait of the director and her film work, which she ended with this work.
response.title: Kuck mal, wer da filmt!
